sentence.Network_en: There was a continual play of lambent fire about his eyes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他眼睛里不断地闪现着炯炯的光芒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 分别以L.O.V.E开头的形容词_百度知道 ... Lamaze [医]心理助产法的 lambent 闪烁的 oafish 痴呆的, 畸形的.
十六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... laconic adj . （用字） 简洁的 lambent a. 轻轻摇曳的, 柔和而光亮的, 轻妙的 lampoon n. 讽刺文章.

list.abs: here they come , my lambent fireflies ., 我闪烁的萤火虫 , 它们来了.
lambent moonlight ., 轻轻闪烁的月光.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin lambent- 'licking', from the verb lambere

auth_sentence.content: She glides away like a lambent flame.

auth_sentence.content: Sharp textural niceties, too, from the first violin's drunken smudges to the lambent clatter of piano, harp and percussion.

auth_sentence.content: It takes a few more close encounters with the lambent fish before my pulse quiets down.
